name: NSAsynchronousFetchResult
desc: A fetch result object that encompasses the response from an executed asynchronous fetch request.

items.name: var fetchRequest: NSAsynchronousFetchRequest<ResultType>
items.desc: The underlying fetch request that was executed.

items.name: var finalResult: [ResultType]?
items.desc: The results that were received from the fetch request.

declaration: class NSAsynchronousFetchResult<ResultType> : NSPersistentStoreAsynchronousResult where ResultType : NSFetchRequestResult
